item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "I Just Got So Emo That I Just Fell Apart!!" -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Fall Out Boy
item.description: "I Want To Be Known For My Hits, Not Just My Misses." -- Fall Out Boy

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Fall Out Boy
item.description: "you wouldnt knew a good thing if came up and slit your throat!" -- Fall Out Boy

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Fall Out Boy
item.description: "i comb the crowd, and pick you out...my mouth moves too fast for you to figure it out..it starts eyes closed..to fingers crossed..to I swear I say..I swear i say.." -- Fall Out Boy

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Fall Out Boy
item.description: "Am I more than you bargained for yet? I've been dying to tell you anything you want to hear Cause that's just who I am this week" -- Fall Out Boy

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "I'm not psycho...I just like psychotic things." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "If for one minute you think you're better than a sixteen year old girl in a Green Day t-shirt, you are sorely mistaken. Remember the first time you went to a show and saw your favorite band. You wore their shirt, and sang every word. You didn't know anything about scene politics, haircuts, or what was cool. All you knew was that this music made you feel different from anyone you shared a locker with. Someone finally understood you. This is what music is about." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Suicide is a serious thing. And if you know anyone who is suicidal, you need to get them help. No one should be in pain. Everyone should love themselves. Like I love you all." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Be yourself, don't take anything from anyone, and never let them take you alive." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "It erases everything I hate about myself. Nothing can hurt me. I feel completely invincible. I feel like everyone else on that stage is invincible and we're capable of anything. There's no stopping us." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Are you on our side...and want to be different, or are you on that side and want to throw a football at my head!?" -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Hey, girls, you're beautiful. Don't look at those stupid magazines with sticklike models. Eat healthy and exercise. That's all. Don't let anyone tell you you're not good enough. You're good enough, you are too good. Love your family with all your heart and listen to it. You are gorgeous, whether you're a size 4 or 14. It doesn't matter what you look like on the outside, as long as you're a good person, as long as you respect others. I know it's been told hundreds of times before, but it's true. Hey, girls, you are beautiful." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "If you look in the mirror and don't like what you see, you can find out first hand what it's like to be me." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Modest Mouse
item.description: "Music is to the soul what words are to the mind." -- Modest Mouse

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Addi Booth
item.description: "smirking between dignified sips of his dignified...peach and lime...daiquri!" -- Addi Booth

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Addi Booth
item.description: "Raindrops on roses and girls in white dresses and sleeping with roaches and taking best guesses and shade of the sheets and before all the stains and a few more of your least favorite things..." -- Addi Booth

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Addi Booth
item.description: "dont take the kid from the fight take the fight from the kid. " -- Addi Booth

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kariel Atreyu add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero
